data.name: Javascript
data.description: I have over 2 years of experience working with Javascript, strong in ES6 syntax.

data.name: Python
data.description: I have 4 months professional experience in Python it for server-side code at my Wave coop, and around 1 year casual experience using it for interviews and interview prep

data.name: PHP
data.description: I have 1.5 years experience with server side PHP and in Wordpress applications.

data.name: C#
data.description: I have 4 months experience using C#, and over 2 years experience using Java. I mention Java because they are very similar languages with a ton of crossover

data.name: ReactJS
data.description: I have been using ReactJS for 4 months, and have quickly ramped up to writing production quality frontend

data.name: Django
data.description: I've used Django for server-side logic at my Wave coop for 4 months. We used the CQRS event sourcing pattern, so my background revolves around that architecture.

data.name: Laravel
data.description: I worked with Laravel and PropelORM at my Calian coop for 1 year.

data.name: ExtJS
data.description: ExtJS is a frontend framework that I used at my Calian coop for 1 year. It uses MVC architecture which taught me important design patterns and optimizations.

data.name: REST
data.description: I am quite experienced with REST, using it for over 2 years. I've had the opportunity to dig deep into the networking aspects, exploring batching and optimizations.

data.name: GraphQL
data.description: I have 4 months of experience withGraphQL. I've written resolvers for queries, and defined schema as well as tests.

data.name: gRPC
data.description: gRPC is a method of data exchange that I've gotten to use during my time at Wave, gaining 4 months experience.

data.name: Protobuf
data.description: Using gRPC necessitates pb, and using it for 4 months, I've gotten the opportunity to define plenty of messages, mappers and transformers.

data.name: Docker
data.description: I have 2 years of experience with Docker. I've used it to create my own microservices, as well as manage orchestration of an ecosystem of services with docker-compose.

data.name: Logging
data.description: I have only 2 months experience of using production logging technologies in a meaningful way. I've been able to build out Datadog dashboards, trace bugs with Sentry and debug problems with Sumo Logic.

data.name: Testing
data.description: I have 2 years combined experience with various testing frameworks, be it Jest for React, Pytest for Django, or SenchaTest (built on Jasmine) for ExtJS.

data.name: CD/CI
data.description: On the CD front: I've used Jenkins for deploymments for 4 months, and CircleCI for creating various testing steps in pipelines for 4 months as well. I've also used Gitlab CI for 1 year, which is quite similar to CircleCI.
